admin_init_prompt: Please enter the password for built-in admin '{admin_user}':
admin_password_mismatch: Initial admin password does not match environment variable, please check
welcome: Welcome, {username}! You have connected to the server
login_failed_already_online: Login failed: User '{username}' is already online
register_failed_taken: Registration failed: Username '{username}' is already taken
register_failed_invalid: Registration failed: Invalid username or password format
password_changed: Your password has been changed successfully
internal_error: An internal server error occurred. Please contact an administrator

kick_broadcast: {target_user} was kicked from the server by {admin}
user_not_found: User '{username}' not found or is not online
